Interface tripleplay.platform.NativeTextField

Added interface tripleplay.platform.NativeOverlay.

Removed Methods
void add() Adds the field to the view.
Signal<Boolean> finishedEditing() A signal that is dispatched when the native text field has lost focus.
boolean hasFocus() Returns true if this native text field currently has focus.
NativeTextField refreshMode(Mode) Updates or creates a new native text field with the given mode.
void remove() Removes the field from the view.
NativeTextField setAutocapitalization(boolean) Configures the autocapitalization behavior of the field on a virtual keyboard.
NativeTextField setAutocorrection(boolean) Configures the autocorrection behavior of the field on a virtual keyboard.
NativeTextField setBounds(IRectangle) Configures the bounds of the native text field (in top-level screen coordinates).
NativeTextField setFont(Font) Configures the font used by the field to render text.
NativeTextField setReturnKeyLabel(String) Configures the label of the return key on virtual keyboards.
NativeTextField setTextType(TextType) Configures the type of text expected to be entered in this field.
NativeTextField setTransformer(Transformer) Sets the transformer for use with this native field.
NativeTextField setValidator(Validator) Sets the validator for use with this native field.
Value<String> text() The current value of the text field.
 

Added Methods
boolean insert(String) Inserts the given text at the current caret position, or if there is a selected region, replaces the region with the given text.
void setEnabled(boolean) Sets the enabled state of the field.
